database.name: VIEW ARB_SALES_ORDER_DETAILS_V
database.view: SELECT ad_client.name AS client, c_order.documentno AS document_no, c_order.docstatus AS document_status, c_order.description AS so_description, c_order.isdelivered, c_order.isinvoiced, c_order.dateordered AS date_ordered, c_order.poreference AS order_reference, c_order.totallines AS total_lines, c_order.grandtotal AS grand_total, c_bpartner.value AS bp_search_key, c_bpartner.name AS bp_name, c_orderline.line, m_product.name AS product_name, m_product.value AS product_key, c_uom.x12de355 AS uom, c_orderline.datepromised AS date_schedule_line, c_orderline.description AS so_line_description, c_orderline.qtyordered AS ordered_qty, c_orderline.qtydelivered AS delivered_qty, c_orderline.qtyinvoiced AS invoiced_qty, c_currency.iso_code AS currency, c_orderline.pricelist AS price_list, c_orderline.priceactual AS price_actual, c_orderline.linenetamt AS line_net_amount FROM c_order LEFT JOIN ad_client ON c_order.ad_client_id = ad_client.ad_client_id LEFT JOIN c_orderline ON c_order.c_order_id = c_orderline.c_order_id LEFT JOIN m_product ON c_orderline.m_product_id = m_product.m_product_id LEFT JOIN c_bpartner ON c_order.c_bpartner_id = c_bpartner.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN c_uom ON c_orderline.c_uom_id = c_uom.c_uom_id LEFT JOIN c_currency ON c_orderline.c_currency_id = c_currency.c_currency_id WHERE c_order.issotrx = 'Y' ORDER BY c_order.documentno, c_orderline.line
